system.description:
City Hall Hub Move

When you bury someone in messy paperwork by manipulating city officials, roll with Heart.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: Your machinations are costly and impotent; a Status-3 NPC takes interest in your schemes.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: Draw unwanted municipal attention; they take -1 ongoing to moves during faction turn.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: Draw unwanted municipal attention; they take -1 ongoing to moves during faction turn. Additionally, convince agents you're doing them a favor; take a Debt on them.
